title: Web Development
seoTitle: Web Development Services | Custom Websites & Web Apps - Fajraan Tech
seoDescription: Fajraan Tech offers expert web development services including custom web applications, e-commerce stores, WordPress websites, landing pages, API integration, and performance optimization.
description: Professional web development services to build high-performing, scalable, and user-friendly websites tailored to your business needs.

subServices.title: Custom Web Applications
subServices.description: Tailored web applications built to meet your specific business requirements with scalability and performance in mind.

subServices.title: WordPress Website Development
subServices.description: Custom WordPress websites designed for ease of use, SEO optimization, and seamless content management.

subServices.title: Shopify & E-commerce Store Development
subServices.description: Fully functional e-commerce stores with secure payment gateways and user-friendly shopping experiences.

subServices.title: Landing Page Design & Development
subServices.description: High-converting landing pages optimized for lead generation and marketing campaigns.

subServices.title: API Integration & Backend Development
subServices.description: Robust backend systems with seamless API integrations for enhanced functionality and connectivity.

subServices.title: Web App Performance Optimization
subServices.description: Optimizing web applications for speed, scalability, and a smooth user experience.

hero.title: Web Development for
hero.subtitle: business solutions
description: Web development is the backbone of your online presence, ensuring your business is accessible, fast, and scalable across devices.
At Fajraan Tech, we specialize in building responsive, secure, and high-performing websites tailored to your business goals.

sections.title: 1/ Frontend Development:
points: We create pixel-perfect, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces using React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.
Our focus is on performance, accessibility, and delivering a seamless experience for your customers.
Key aspects include layouts, animations, cross-browser compatibility, and mobile-first design.

sections.title: 2/ Backend Development:
points: We build robust, secure, and scalable backend systems with Node.js, Express.js, and modern APIs.
Our team ensures smooth integration with databases, third-party tools, and custom business logic.
Key aspects include API development, authentication, data management, and security.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We follow a proven methodology to deliver web development projects that are fast, reliable, and business-focused:

steps.title: Discovery & Planning:
points: Understanding your business requirements, target audience, and technical needs to define project goals.

steps.title: Design & Development:
points: Crafting responsive UI/UX and coding backend logic with a focus on scalability, security, and performance.

steps.title: Launch & Growth:
points: Deploying your website, monitoring performance, and providing ongoing support with iterative improvements.
